actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide price support for milk at not less than 90 percent of parity with quarterly adjustments for the period beginning April 1, 1977 and ending on March 31, 1979.

summary.text: Sets, under the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended, the price support for milk from April 1, 1977, to March 31, 1979, at no less than 90 percent of parity, with quarterly adjustments to reflect any change in the index of farm prices.

titles.title: A bill to provide price support for milk at not less than 90 percent of parity with quarterly adjustments for the period beginning April 1, 1977 and ending on March 31, 1979.
